CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 24, 1955, pg. 5, reads: "'For Last Ride' - Pallbearers carry the body of Mrs. Gladys Marie Nowlin from Hopewell Funeral Home "for last ride" to cemetery. Mrs. Nowlin was fatally stabbed Friday night.  Witnesses say that she was pushed from a black Ford sedan on Hazelwood Avenue. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Pallbearers carrying light colored casket of Gladys Marie Nowlin out of Hopewell Funeral Home, with woman holding floral arrangement on left, 7609 Tioga Street, Homewood
